snippet: I spoke with Frida Giannini, creative director of Gucci, and Giambattista Valli live from Rome on Friday, Nov 15, the final day of the 2012 IHT Luxury Conference about "their Rome."
abstract: I spoke with Frida Giannini, creative director of Gucci, and Giambattista Valli live from Rome on Friday, Nov 15, the final day of the 2012 IHT Luxury Conference about "their Rome."

headline.main: IHT Luxury Conference 2012: What Makes Rome Eternal for Designers
